item.title: The Low Darts
item.description:
The Low Darts

A group of young people with awesome taste in songs to cover and the chops to pull them off!

Steely Dan is a 70’s “group” whose music has definitely aged well. As most fans know, there wasn’t a real “group” (at least for long) and most albums were created by

item.title: My Original Title
item.description: The Low Darts A group of young people with awesome taste in songs to cover and the chops to pull them off! Steely Dan is a 70’s “group” whose music has definitely aged well. As most fans know, there wasn’t a real “group” (at least for long) and most albums were created by switching out players and even entire sessions of musicians, with only Walter Becker and Donald Fagan being the creative and technical constants.
